This gorgeous gown features intricate floral applique detailing on the waist and shoulders, adding a touch of elegance to your ensemble. The V-neck sleeveless design and A-line silhouette create a flattering and comfortable fit for any special occasion. The midnight color/pattern adds a touch of sophistication, while the center back zipper closure ensures ease of wear. This gown is lined and comes with a built-in bra for added support. Crafted from 100% polyester, this gown is imported and should be spot cleaned only. Add this exquisite piece to your wardrobe for a show-stopping look.

products.name: Keith Hooded Bathrobe
products.brandedName: Missoni Home Keith Hooded Bathrobe
products.description: Wrap yourself in luxury with the Missoni Home Keith Hooded Bathrobe. This exquisite robe features the distinct patterns and bold colors that Missoni Home is known for, all done in Italian luxury. The multicolored design of the Keith group features looped cotton terry with an all-over black and white zigzag motif. Made from 100% cotton, this robe is not only stylish but also incredibly comfortable. Care instructions include ironing at a maximum temperature of 150°C, tumble drying at a lower temperature, washing at a maximum of 40°C, and avoiding bleach and dry cleaning. Made in Portugal, this robe is the perfect addition to your loungewear collection.

Through vibrant florals, textured ruffles, and bold patterns, the collection inspires women to embrace their romantic and whimsical side, seeking adventure, excitement, and celebration. The Green Dandelion Floral Giselle Dress promises to make a statement. There are so many gorgeous details here that we don't know where to start! Our favorite might be the playful ruffle neckline that can be worn on or off-the-shoulder. This maxi also boasts a flattering fitted bodice with a full skirt that sways as you move. Made for slipping into any event or soiree, this beauty just needs to be paired with some heels and a clutch for a jaw-dropping look. products.name: Oversized Shirt
products.brandedName: James Perse Oversized Shirt
products.description: Oversized Shirt Oversized Shirt 100% linen. Made in China. Machine wash. Front button closure. JAME-WS2644. WKO3970. James Perse started out by making the perfect baseball cap; film directors ordered hats for their cast and crew and record labels bought them for tours. In 1994 he launched a t-shirt line that rapidly gained loyal fans looking for a seamless blend of luxe and casual. James personal design philosophy and aesthetic is low maintenance high fashion, emphasizing elegance and comfort, pairing sophistication with simplicity.
